headline.print_headline: As Artificial Intelligence Evolves, So Does Its Criminal Potential
headline.main: As Artificial Intelligence Evolves, So Does Its Criminal Potential

snippet: The next generation of online attack tools used by criminals will add machine learning capabilities pioneered by A.I. researchers....
abstract: Law enforcement and computer security experts caution it is only matter of time before artificial intelligence will be used by criminals, given how advanced the technology is becoming; particularly worrisome is growing use of customer service chatbots that could be exploited by criminals to manipulate people into divulging private information or performing some questionable action.
